extendedInfo.description: Body Balance is designed to measure your overall body structural parity. The percentages provided are derived from a T-Nation article that provides anecdotal and observational data on a number of different exercises.  This data is used in Body Balance to determine expected lift weights derived from a single base exercise.  The base exercises include the Deadlift, Back Squat, Bench Press, Front Squat, Close-grip Bench Press, Barbell Curl, Dumbbell Curl, and Dumbbell Overhead Triceps Extension.  Additional exercises range across a number of muscle groups.Body Balance now features a quick and easy RM calculator!  You can calculate any rep max range from 1-12, based on an existing weight and rep range you already know.  It allows you to use any of the most popular formulas.  The application has also been updated for copy paste functionality app-wide.  Long press a weight set value to paste into it directly.  There's also a lb-kg calculator in case you need one.Once you choose your base exercise and input a weight for the lift, Body Balance will give you expected lift weights for some other exercises. You can input your actual numbers to determine muscle groups that may be lagging.  The numbers are for a given rep range, so if you input a number for a 5RM as the base exercise, the expected values correspond to 5RM numbers.Body Balance supports Imperial and Metric units.NOTE: Body Balance is NOT designed to estimate what you should be lifting and should NOT be used for this purpose. It is strictly for your existing lift numbers. Do NOT use it to estimate numbers for new exercises. Please be smart about your weightlifting!

reviews.title: Superb app!! Recommend.
reviews.comment: If you insert a log, able to sync with server, to store data in cloud for backup would be a plus. Would pay for this app.   When selecting exercise in the menu, the list could go directly to that exercise i stead of starting on top.
reviews.author: Gustavo M.

reviews.title: A lot of data
reviews.comment: There\'s a ton of data to take in. Also, you really need to know your stats before you start using this app. Much of what\'s available here won\'t make sense unless you fully know your capabilities and have experience doing the lifts that are outlined. This is a great tool for progress across the board. I highly recommend it for this fact alone.
reviews.author: Justin Lillich

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Confirm before exit would be nice. And EZ-Bar skull crushers says \'2 dumbbell total\' under it. Otherwise, awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying to use on droid
reviews.comment: Back buttom exits app. Annoying for android users.
reviews.author: That Nguyen

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Have had no issues in gnex. Looks great and functions great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could save my body
reviews.comment: This app could mean the difference between a healthy body or a long hospital visit for overtraining the wrong muscles. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Beautiful app which works the way you expect it to. A+ would bang again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gorgeous
reviews.comment: This app is beautifully designed and, based on my numbers, very accurate.   Really well done.

reviews.title: Really nice interface
reviews.comment: This is superb on Asus transformer tf300. It would be nice to be able to enter something else than 1RM and calculate the 1RM from this value

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: And does what it says well  Awesome UI as well!
